<html><head><style type="text/css"><!-- DIV {margin:0px;} --></style></head><body><div style="font-family:times new roman, new york, times, serif;font-size:12pt">Fantastic site Stefan.  Never knew Jewel was a yodeler.  I will take the lessons but I want to also learn to River Dance at the same time.  Then put it all to EVP.  LOL  This probably won't get through to post but it's a good break in the action.  Ron L
